title: PTD Today — Media

items.title: Build your first GraphRAG Powered Agent! (No Graph Expert Required) | Databases for AI

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This session shows how to build a knowledge graph (GraphRAG-powered agent) quickly using the same AI tools teams already use. It features a live demo on real documents and stresses practical, fast deployment without a six-month project or needing a graph expert.
bullets: Explains how knowledge graphs unlock information trapped in docs, PDFs, and wikis.
Shows a step-by-step build you can complete in an afternoon using familiar AI tools.
Includes a live demo using real documents.
Frames the approach as practical and low-overhead—no six-month project and no graph expert required.
takeaways: Turning existing docs, PDFs, and wikis into a knowledge graph can make operational knowledge more accessible for operations and troubleshooting.
A rapid, afternoon-scale build enables quick pilots and faster validation before committing to larger rollouts.
Removing the need for a dedicated graph expert lowers skill and hiring barriers for adoption.
A live-demo approach helps validate practicality and fit for specific data-center or grid documentation needs.

items.title: Watch Live: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Holds News Conference | WSJ

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks to reporters following the Federal Reserve's two-day policy-setting meeting. The video is posted by WSJ News and is tagged with #JeromePowell, #Fed, and #WSJ.
bullets: Jerome Powell addresses reporters after the Fed's two-day policy meeting.
Event follows the Federal Reserve's policy-setting session.
Source: WSJ News (hashtags include #JeromePowell, #Fed, #WSJ).
No transcript is available for the video.
takeaways: Watch or follow this press conference for the Fed chair's official comments coming directly after the policy meeting.
Treat the event as an authoritative source to confirm any statements or decisions announced by the Fed.
Share key points from the conference with finance and operations teams to evaluate potential implications for financing and planning.
Use WSJ coverage or direct quotes from Powell for timely stakeholder briefings and risk assessments.

items.title: Deutsche Bank accelerates Cloud journeys with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description… Google Cloud Consulting worked with Deutsche Bank to design novel learning experiences that helped thousands of engineers become fluent in cloud engineering. The program used Generative AI to deliver personalized, interactive training that blends on‑demand convenience with instructor‑led effectiveness, with Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services providing the creative innovation and technical expertise to build the Cloud Engineering Program and accelerate the bank’s cloud journey.
bullets: Consulting designed novel learning experiences for Deutsche Bank engineers.
Program helped thousands of engineers become fluent in cloud engineering.
Generative AI enabled personalized, interactive training content.
Training blended on‑demand learning with instructor‑led sessions.
Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services supplied creative and technical expertise to build and scale the program.
takeaways: AI‑driven personalization can scale cloud upskilling across large engineering populations.
Blended on‑demand plus instructor‑led formats offer both convenience and guided learning for faster proficiency.
Engaging a cloud consulting team brings the creative and technical capabilities needed to design enterprise‑level training programs.
Establishing an internal cloud engineering program can accelerate an organization’s overall cloud adoption journey.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This episode in PwC’s year-end toolkit series focuses on strengthening the finance team’s engagement with the audit committee, streamlining year-end reporting, and addressing emerging oversight topics. It highlights collaboration, key year-end accounting issues, and oversight of AI, enterprise risk management, cyber risk in the age of AI, and proxy disclosures.
bullets: Guidance on improving management/audit committee communication and collaboration.
Overview of key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should prepare to address.
Discussion of AI oversight: risks, opportunities, and control considerations.
Approaches to enhancing enterprise risk oversight and evolving cyber risk management.
Considerations for elevating proxy disclosures and governance communication.
takeaways: Engage audit committees proactively on AI initiatives and the controls in place to manage related risks.
Prepare clear year-end reporting materials that address transformation initiatives and other material issues for committee review.
Prioritize cyber risk discussions with governance given the changing threat landscape in the age of AI.
Align enterprise risk oversight and reporting to give audit committees a consolidated view for decision-making.
Review and update proxy disclosures to reflect governance, risk oversight, and significant technology-related matters.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video follows Jo as they discover the power of Copilot Groups for making route planning easier. It frames Copilot as an AI-driven assistant that can simplify planning workflows.
bullets: Features Jo learning and using Copilot Groups.
Primary focus: route planning made easy.
Positions Copilot as an AI helper for planning tasks.
Includes tags highlighting Copilot and AI (#copilot, #microsoftcopilot, #ai).
takeaways: If route planning is part of your operations, the video signals Copilot Groups may be a relevant tool to evaluate.
Consider assessing whether AI-assisted route planning could support field crew scheduling or logistics coordination.
A brief demonstration like this can justify a short pilot to test integration with existing planning systems.
Watch for interoperability and data-security considerations before adopting new AI planning tools.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… KPMG ON AIR presents Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska discussing how AI is already integrated into audit practice, supporting repetitive tasks, full-population data analysis, documentation and client communication through tools like AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI and the KPMG Clara platform. They cover how these technologies change auditors' roles and needed competencies, practical benefits for clients, implementation challenges, data security and regulatory issues, potential AI risks, and future directions.
bullets: AI Transaction Scoring Tool enables analysis of entire populations, moving beyond traditional sampling.
Clara AI offers conversational assistance and specialized agents to support audit workflows.
AI supports documentation, disclosure analysis and real-time audit management via KPMG Clara.
Clara for Clients modernizes client communication and data exchange.
Discussion includes auditor adaptation, implementation challenges, data security/regulation and AI-related risks.
takeaways: Full-population analysis means organisations should ensure data accessibility and structured records to support AI-driven audits.
Secure, audit-ready client interfaces (e.g., Clara for Clients) can streamline communication and evidence sharing.
Data security, compliance and governance for AI tools must be prioritized to satisfy regulatory and audit requirements.
Plan for training and change management so staff can work effectively with AI-augmented audit processes.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, NVIDIA GeForce published the 4K launch trailer for Arknights: Endfield announcing support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode and the game is described as a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play the Endministrator across Talos-II.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Game described as a 3D real-time strategy RPG; player role: Endministrator of Endfield Industries on Talos-II.
Trailer footage captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra with DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Links provided for full DLSS 4 announcement and the game's official site.
NVIDIA GeForce and Arknights: Endfield social channels are listed for follow-up.
takeaways: The trailer demonstrates DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation in a real-game capture at 4K using an RTX 5080, indicating DLSS 4 is being deployed in new AAA titles.
Workflows involving high-resolution real-time capture or render may require GPUs compatible with DLSS 4 (example shown: GeForce RTX 5080).
For teams tracking gaming-driven GPU features, the launch signals continued adoption of NVIDIA's DLSS 4 MFG technology in commercial releases.
